summary: This is an email chain from October 2019 forwarding an invitation from the FBI Victim Services Division to victims of Jeffrey Epstein. It announces two informational briefings for victims, one in Miramar, Florida, and one in New York City, to discuss available victim services. The email clarifies administrative details about the invitation.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in Florida
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division holds a briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein in Miramar, Florida, to inform them about available victim services.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division holds a briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein in New York City to inform them about available victim services.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division organized briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein in October 2019.
Two briefings were scheduled: October 15, 2019, in Miramar, Florida, and October 23, 2019, in New York City.
The purpose was to inform victims about available services, not to provide specific details about the active investigation.
Victims were invited to attend with one support person and had to RSVP by October 4, 2019.
The correspondence references an active FBI investigation under case number NY-3027571.
